titleStmt.title: An universal prayer for all which regards salvation

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and sold by William Weston, printer, and stationerto [sic], the King's most Excellent Majesty, for his houshold and chappel,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by Wing.
